entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a person who had an idea from Dumbledore's Army and got the idea of poisoning the mead from Hermione Granger. He was talking to someone about enchanted coins.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who led a group called Dumbledore's Army that used a secret method of communication last year. He was sitting on the wall and his voice was light and conversational.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who saw Dumbledore slip an inch lower down the wall when he said something about Dumbledore's Army.

entities.name: granger
entities.description: Granger is mentioned as a Mudblood who talked in the library about Filch not recognising potions. Malfoy got the idea of poisoning the mead from her.

relationships.description: Malfoy got the idea for enchanted coins from Dumbledore's Army.
Malfoy got the idea of poisoning the mead from Granger.
